p: A/Korea/S0003/2019 and A/Korea/S0002/2019 viruses exhibited significantly reduced inhibition by oseltamivir and peramivir with > 100 IC 50 fold-changes relative to drug-sensitive virus, but were normally susceptible to zanamivir (Table 6). However, every isolate collected from the KINRESS in 2018–2019 was susceptible to all three drugs.
